item.title: Root Certificate Authority Role Separation
item.description: The thing I hate the most in the world is struggling with Windows limitations. The second is being forced to do so. One month ago I received a company-owned laptop and it was configured via Active Directory shits, but for me it makes no sense to have a device without being the full owner (at least in an administration way, not as Stallman would like for any code that runs on his machine).
